Uses of Package
javax.xml.stream

Packages that use javax.xml.stream
javax.xml.bind Provides a runtime binding framework for client applications including unmarshalling, marshalling, and validation capabilities. 
javax.xml.bind.helpers JAXB Provider Use Only: Provides partial default implementations for some of the javax.xml.bind interfaces. 
javax.xml.stream   
javax.xml.stream.events   
javax.xml.stream.util   
javax.xml.transform.stax Provides for StAX-specific transformation APIs. 
 

Classes in javax.xml.stream used by javax.xml.bind

          The XMLStreamReader interface allows forward, read-only access to XML.
XMLStreamWriter
          The XMLStreamWriter interface specifies how to write XML.

          Defines an abstract implementation of a factory for getting streams.

          This interface is used to report non-fatal errors.
XMLResolver
          This interface is used to resolve resources during an XML parse.

XMLStreamException
